pr_title: add method to get all tapChanger steps

timeline.message:
add method to get all tapChanger steps

Signed-off-by: Jérémy LABOUS <jlabous@silicom.fr>

timeline.bodyHTML:
You can have a more working default implementation:

Map<Integer, S> steps = new HashMap();
for (int i = getLowTapPosition(); i <= getHighTapPosition; i++) {
  steps.put(i, getStep(i));
}
return steps;
timeline.author: miovd

timeline.message:
change default implementation by a working one

Signed-off-by: Jérémy LABOUS <jlabous@silicom.fr>
